channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows Azure Pack Rollup 13.1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows Azure Pack Rollup 13.1

item.title: CVE-2018-8652|2024-08-05T07:02:26.096Z -- microsoft -- windows%20azure%20pack%20rollup%2013.1
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Windows Azure Pack does not properly sanitize user-provided input, aka "Windows Azure Pack Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability." This affects Windows Azure Pack Rollup 13.1.
